company.name: Company name
company.photoSize: Photo size should be less than 2 MB!
company.loginRule: Required field! Login must be in lowercase, you can use char "-" as delimiter! For example "steam-noginsk".
company.noDishes: Dishes with selected filters not found

comingSoon.1: Adding a position to the stop list or promotion list
comingSoon.1c: You no longer have to answer the guest with a refusal that this dish is not available today: in the administrator's office, it is enough to check the box, and the dish will be hidden from the menu. Check the “Promotion” box, specify the updated price and promotion period, after which the promotional price will immediately be displayed in the menu
comingSoon.2: Translation into all languages of the world
comingSoon.2c: Before viewing the menu, the guest of the establishment will be able to choose the language convenient for him, after which the description of the dishes and their compositions will be translated into the selected language. Make a convenient choice of dishes for foreign guests
comingSoon.3c: Guests from other countries often convert the local currency into the currency of their country in order to understand the cost of dishes and spend extra time and effort on ordering. The Mily electronic menu, at the request of the user, will instantly convert prices into the desired currency at the official rate
comingSoon.4c: We are sure that your establishment has its own unique history and atmosphere, which are reflected in the style of your restaurant. Mily will allow you to design your electronic menu in accordance with your corporate identity
comingSoon.5c: Do you already have a website, but is there a menu or not, or is editing it inconvenient? iLikeEat will allow you to place an electronic menu on your site to make it even more convenient for your guests

content.idea: Is an always up-to-date electronic menu that provides guests of restaurants, cafes and establishments with a convenient interface for choosing dishes and drinks, with access via a QR code or a web link. This service is part of the handscream.com project/ideology. No trackers and no ads! Service for people!
content.1: Reducing costs on the print menu
content.1c: Need to add one position or remove several? Do you want to change the price of a dish? With iLikeEat, a few clicks in the administrator's office are enough to update the menu of your restaurant! There is no need to print the menu with new information, iLikeEat will update the menu for all users!
content.2c: Many guests of the institution want to get acquainted with the menu even before the moment of visiting it, in order to evaluate the range and order of prices. A unique link to the electronic menu of your establishment can be placed on your website, in all social networks, on online maps and in popular online catalogs
content.3: Access to the electronic menu by QR code
content.3c: Place a QR code on the tables, and when you hover your phone's camera, the user will be able to get instant access to the electronic menu of your establishment. The user does not need special programs, a camera and a standard browser are enough
content.4: Quick search for food or drinks
content.4c: All dishes are divided into categories for easy search. The guest no longer needs to scroll through the menu in search of a category, all of them are compactly presented on one screen
content.5: Electronic menu for several establishments at once
content.5c: Do you have multiple establishments? Within one account, you will be able to maintain a unique electronic menu for each of the restaurants
content.6c: I am building iLikeEat so that an employee with minimal experience using mobile devices can edit the electronic menu. This is achieved through a clear and intuitive interface. By the way, a mobile phone will be enough to work with the menu.
content.7: Don't think about the technical part
content.7c: Here is just a small selection of what you will not need to think about: renting and maintaining a server, creating a database, developing a website, purchasing a domain, maintenance, finding specialists to carry out these works

features.featuresDesc: Concentrate on your restaurant, the best tools for this are already at your disposal
features.1c: Create your company and provide information
features.2: Create a unique URL for your company
features.2c: With a beautiful URL, users can easily find your establishment
features.3c: Add a restaurant to your company, if you have more than one restaurant it is not a problem to add several restaurants
features.4c: You can specify in what currency the price is indicated for each restaurant
features.5c: You can create a unique menu for each restaurant
features.6c: Add dishes, specify the name, composition, price, category, upload a photo - all this is easy and convenient
features.7c: Food categories help users find what they want faster
features.8c: Generation of a QR code for the menu directly in the service interface
features.9c: The service works in any modern browser and does not require additional installations, not a phone for both the user and the owner of the establishment

additional.surpriseDesc: Join the iLikeEat community today! A month of using the service is completely free. iLikeEat is a service that provides a convenient tool for both the restaurant visitor and the owner!
additional.teamDesc: The iLikeEat service is being developed for the convenience of users! I love what I do, enjoy! If you have any suggestions or questions please write!

questions.1: What makes your service different from others?
questions.1c: Service iLikeEat - is developed for first of all for users!
questions.12c: You pay a fixed fee and use all the features of the service, including new functionality.
questions.14c: Month of use is free. Help with integration.
questions.15c: The choice of the currency in which the trade is carried out.
questions.17c: You have no worries and expenses for the technical part, and there is also no need to reprint the menu when changing the dish.
questions.21c: Create a company in your personal account.
questions.22c: Add a restaurant to your company.
questions.23c: Add a menu to your restaurant.
questions.24c: Print the menu QR code and place it in a convenient place for the user.
questions.3c: In the admin panel, you must select a restaurant.
questions.31c: Next, you need to add a dish and fill in the appropriate fields (name, composition, cost, photo).
questions.33c: If you need help with menu placement, write, we will help!
questions.4: How often can information be updated?
questions.4c: Information is updated solely at your request, the service does not set restrictions.
questions.5: Do I need to add photos?
questions.5c: The photo will help the guest decide on the dish and stimulate appetite. As practice shows, guests prefer dishes with photos, and scroll through dishes without photos.
questions.6: How does the electronic menu help?
questions.6c: It often happens that before going to a restaurant, you want to study the dishes and choose the ones you like, as well as determine the prices. The electronic menu from our iLikeEat service will help the user to make a choice in your restaurant!
questions.61c: You can place a link to your restaurant's email on social networks or on Yandex or Google online maps.
questions.62c: Beautiful photos of your dishes, convenient service for choosing food and quality service are the keys to the success of any restaurant!
questions.7c: At the moment, the service is absolutely free to place the menu!
questions.71c: In the future, the cost of the service per month for one restaurant will be approximately $10-15 in dollar terms.
